markets.title: Will be the block difficulty for Ethereum Mainnet be higher than 3000?

outcomes.title: No
outcomes.when: the block difficulty is _lower_ (or equal) than 3000

markets.title: Will be the Ethereum Mainnet block gas limit be greater than 8.000.500?

outcomes.title: Yes
outcomes.when: the block gas limit is _higher_ than 8.000.500

outcomes.title: No
outcomes.when: the block gas limit is _lower_ (or equal) than 8.000.500

markets.title: Will the Ethereum USD value be higher than 200?

outcomes.title: Yes
outcomes.when: the value of ethereum in USD is _higher_ than 200

outcomes.title: No
outcomes.when: the value of ethereum in USD is _lower_ (or equal) than 200
